ComicInfo.Title: Elvira's Inferno: Canto Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hellish hijinks continue, as Elvira and Faust go deeper and deeper into the Underworld. Will they escape judgment, or does the Lord of the Flies have something special waiting for them? It's Dante's Inferno with sex appeal and dirty jokes, in the next exciting issue of ELVIRA: MISTRESS OF THE DARK, brought to you by David Avallone (Bettie Page) and Dave Acosta (Twelve Devils Dancing), the team who brought you Doc Savage: Ring of Fire and Twilight Zone: The Shadow, which maybe you would have read if Elvira had been in them.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Lucio Parrillo | 1 | B | Cover B | Craig Cermak (a) & Brittany Pezzillo (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | John Royle (a) & Mohan (c) | 3 | D/Sub | Subscription Cover | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Craig Cermak (a) & Brittany Pezzillo (c) | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Royle | 6 | G/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Lucio Parrillo | 7 | H/FOC | 1:5 FOC Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Roberto Castro (a) & Salvatore Aiala (c) | 8 | I/FOC | 1:15 FOC Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Roberto Castro | 9 |
